main event: A bright object was observed in the sky over Buffalo, New York on January 8, 1966 at 5:30 PM.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light that illuminated the surrounding area.
The object was observed by a police officer for several minutes before it disappeared.
The sighting was reported to the police and filed as part of Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's study of UFO sightings.
No other details about the object's size, shape, or motion are provided in the report.
The report offers a brief, factual account of the sighting without speculation or analysis.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
